topics view
In the prisoners' dilemma currently exploring the conditions in which cooperative behavior can emerge from a sea of agents initialized with noise.

Agent feature idea: Collate news/research feeds into a daily summary? Could go to say Arxiv and fetch any new papers under certain topics you select and build you a list of brief summaries of research as one part of the daily feed. Could also go to things like space news sites, any newsletters you want to follow, etc… Cassie was talking about being in awe of dobsons ability to follow whats happening in research environments.
platform built for recommending music and streamlining supporting artists

Recommends songs from all over music, not limited to what you own/have access to. Has in depth music recommendation, playlist building, social aspects, and p2p music recommendation. Recommendation algorithms built on artists and users input on what songs, artists, and albums are similar.

Allow users to add links between songs, artists, and musicians. Use these connections to build playlists and recommend songs and artists. Allow users to define who they want to see more: big or small artist, etc.
make importing Spotify playlists trivially easy. Make onboarding as easy as possible. Also maybe make it so you can export playlists to Spotify?

API built for plugging into a music library to play songs from the library. Won’t play songs you don’t have in your librsry. Idea is use it to find songs, have a tool go and pirate those songs, then play them.

How it supports musicians: allow the user to donate an amount of money and have that split among payments to the artists they are listening to. If you want to donate to a specific artist, do that. If you want to donate according to how much you listen to artists, do that. Say top 5, 10, 50 artists by song plays.
music platform has Features like day lists, radios, playlists based on one or multiple songs, etc

for the agent project, maybe I should make a central terminal system I load up, and individual agents take over the receiving side of the ui. Maybe I can have a light model route things and have it automatically change who gets called. Make it easier to work on the agents and the ui differently
MIST - Modular Integrated Services and Technology
testing 123
hi!

MIST: Want it to be a unified framework I interact with. Heavily modular on the agent side. - [ ] Allow me to write whole files. Include these in the aggregate command but within each topic folder have a folder of my note files. The ai should organize all the files I write.  It should also make a markdown file that’s just all the notes I’ve written thus far, separate from the synthesized file. - [ ] Optionally make other agent systems share or have separate personalities.
Project idea: generative neural network for playing the game from econ? Bubble game Moinas and Pouget
